member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.GetCenterPoint

summary.code: Retrieves the center point of the manipulation in content coordinates. If there is no manipulation in progress, retrieves the center point of the viewport.

member.param: The center on the horizontal axis.
The center on the vertical axis.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.GetInertiaEndTransform
member.summary: Gets the final transform, including inertia, of the primary content.
member.param: The transformed matrix that represents the inertia ending position.

param.name: pointCount
param.para: This value is always 6, because a 3x2 matrix is used for all direct manipulation transforms.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetHorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Sets the horizontal alignment of the primary content relative to the viewport.

param.name: alignment
param.para: One or more values from DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT. The default is DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_NONE.
param.div: Note You cannot combine the following options: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_LEFT, DIRECTMANIPULATION-HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_CENTER, DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_RIGHT. DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_UNLOCKCENTER can be combined with any option but cannot be configured by itself.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetSnapCoordinate

summary.code: Specifies the coordinate system for snap points or snap intervals.

member.param: One of the values from DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TYPES.

param.name: coordinate
param.para: One of the values from DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE.
If motion is set to translation (DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TRANSLATEX or DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TRANSLATEY), all values of DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE are valid.
If motion is set to DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_ZOOM, only DIRECTMANIPULATION_COORDINATE_ORIGIN of DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE is valid (origin must be set to 0.0f).

param.name: origin
param.para: The initial, or starting, snap point. All snap points are relative to this one. Only used when DIRECTMANIPULATION_COORDINATE_ORIGIN is set.
If motion is set to DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_ZOOM, then origin must be set to 0.0f.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetSnapInterval

summary.code: Specifies snap points for the inertia end position at uniform intervals.

member.param: One of the DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TYPES enumeration values.
The interval between each snap point.
The offset from the coordinate specified in SetSnapCoordinate.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetSnapPoints
member.summary: Specifies the snap points for the inertia rest position.
member.param: One or more of the DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TYPES enumeration values. Only DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TRANSLATE_X, DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TRANSLATE_Y, or DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_ZOOM are allowed.
An array of snap points within the boundaries of the content to snap to. Should be specified in increasing order relative to the origin set in SetSnapCoordinate.
The size of the array of snap points. Should be greater than 0.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If there is no change in the snap points, this method can return S_FALSE. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. If invalid snap points are specified, existing snap points might be affected.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetSnapType
member.summary: Specifies the type of snap point.
member.param: One or more of the DIRECTMANIPULATION_MOTION_TYPES enumeration values.

param.name: type
param.para: One of the DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE enumeration values.
If set to DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE_NONE, snap points specified through SetSnapPoints or SetSnapInterval are cleared.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetVerticalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of the primary content in the viewport.

param.name: alignment
param.para: One or more values from DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.
param.div: Note You cannot combine DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_TOP, DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_CENTER, or DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_BOTTOM. DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_UNLOCKCENTER can be combined with any option but cannot be configured by itself.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent.SetZoomBoundaries
member.summary: Specifies the minimum and maximum boundaries for zoom.
member.param: The minimum zoom level allowed. Must be greater than or equal to 0.1f, which corresponds to 100% zoom.
The maximum zoom allowed. Must be greater than zoomMinimum and less than FLT_MAX.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationPrimaryContent
member.summary: Encapsulates the primary content inside a viewport. Primary content is the content specified during the creation of a viewport.
